coverages.details: Reimburses non-refundable trip payments/deposits if trip is cancelled *before departure* due to specified covered reasons (e.g., illness/injury of insured/travelling companion/family member, specific quarantine conditions met, traffic accident on departure day, legal attendance requirement, primary residence uninhabitable, carrier delay >24h, travel agent insolvency). Must notify travel suppliers within 72 hours of discovering need to cancel. Travel agent insolvency sublimit applies, insolvency must occur within 60 days before trip commencement overseas and must have been filed after policy purchase.

Reimburses the prorated portion of unused non-refundable trip payments/deposits if the trip must be interrupted or ended early *after departure* due to specified covered reasons (similar to Trip Cancellation reasons but occurring during the trip, plus hijacking). Must notify travel suppliers within 72 hours of discovering need to curtail.

coverages.coverage_name: Trip Interruption - Trip Incident (Early Return, Trip Continuation, Extended Stay)
coverages.details: Coverage for Early/Delayed Return transportation costs, Trip Continuation transportation costs, and Extended Stay accommodation/transportation costs due to trip interruption is not provided under the Gold Plan.

Reimburses lost prepaid expenses and additional expenses (meals, accommodation, communication, transport) up to the daily limit, for delays of at least 6 consecutive hours due to specified covered reasons (e.g., carrier delay, strike, specific quarantine, natural disaster, lost/stolen documents, hijacking, traffic accident). Reimbursement is per 24-hour period of delay. Receipts must be provided.

limits.type: Maximum benefit for all high value items combined

coverages.details: Covers baggage lost, damaged, or stolen while on the trip. Pays the lesser of repair cost or replacement cost depreciated by 10% per full year since purchase (max 50% depreciation). Requires reasonable steps to protect/recover baggage, report loss/theft/damage within 24 hours (police report for theft of high-value items). Original receipts or proof of purchase required (otherwise limit is 50% of replacement cost). High value items include electronics, jewelry, cameras, etc. Excludes specific items like money, documents, keys, business property, unattended items.
Reimburses expenses for essential items needed when baggage is delayed by an airline, cruise line, or other travel carrier for at least 6 hours while on the trip. Receipts must be provided.

limits.type: Continuation medical treatment in Singapore (max 14 days) - Ages 0-69 years
Continuation medical treatment in Singapore (max 14 days) - Ages 70 years and above

coverages.details: Covers reasonable and customary costs for emergency medical or dental treatment required due to sudden, unexpected illness or injury (including diagnosed COVID-19) during the trip outside Singapore. Care must be medically necessary. Dental sublimit applies to dental infection, broken tooth, dental injury, or lost filling. Hospital cash of $150 per 24 hours confinement is paid if hospitalised outside Singapore for over 48 hours (first 48 hours not covered). Continuation medical treatment in Singapore is covered up to 14 days after return (must seek treatment within 48 hours of return if not treated overseas; COVID claims require positive test during trip). TCM treatment covered up to sublimit. Pre-existing conditions excluded. Allianz Assistance must be contacted prior to hospitalisation where possible.

Covers transportation needed following a medical emergency during the trip. Includes emergency evacuation to the nearest appropriate medical facility if local facilities are inadequate, medical repatriation home when medically stable, transport for a friend/family member to bedside if hospitalised >120h, return transport for dependents if insured is hospitalised >24h or dies, repatriation of remains if death occurs on trip. Search and rescue costs by a professional team are covered up to the sublimit if reported missing or needing rescue from a physical emergency. All transportation must be arranged in advance by Allianz Assistance.

Pays a lump sum benefit if the insured suffers death or permanent disablement as a result of a travel accident occurring during the trip. The death or disablement must occur within 90 days from the date of the accident. If the accident occurs during a flight, it must be on a commercial airline between two commercial airports. Excludes illness, natural causes, persons under 16 years.
Coverage for legal liability for accidental injury/death to third parties or damage to their property is not provided under the Gold Plan.
Coverage for missing a prepaid activity during the trip is not provided under the Gold Plan.
Coverage for lost, damaged, or stolen sporting equipment during the trip is not provided under the Gold Plan.
Coverage for renting sporting equipment if personal equipment is lost, damaged, or stolen during the trip is not provided under the Gold Plan.
Specific sports-related search and rescue coverage is not provided under the Gold Plan (Note: General Search & Rescue is included under Emergency Transportation).

Covers the excess or deductible the insured is liable to pay if their rental car is damaged or stolen during the scheduled rental period on the trip. The driver must be listed on the rental agreement. Excludes certain vehicle types (e.g., trucks, campers, motorcycles, high-value cars >$75k), uses (e.g., commercial, off-road), and violating the rental agreement.

Reimburses the cost (including shipping fees) to replace a passport, visa, or other identification document if it is stolen, lost, or damaged while on the trip. The document must have had at least six months validity remaining from the date of loss.

Reimburses personal money (cash) if it is lost or stolen within four hours after being withdrawn from an ATM during the trip, while being carried or in a locked safety deposit box. Requires proof of the incident (e.g., police report) and proof of withdrawal. Reimbursement is limited to the amount withdrawn.
